title: The Providence Journal saw its web traffic soar 279% at the end of 2025
description: It’s an unfortunate truism that bad news in the real world is often good news for news publishers. Tragedy attracts eyeballs, and that’s even more true when the tragedy doesn’t have a clear ending. On December 13, a 48-year-old man opened fire on a group of Brown University students studying for finals, killing two and...
